attributes.action: Ensure all Conservative MP's have twitter accounts
attributes.additional_details:
As your Party are steadfast in legislating against the British peoples it is only fair and just that those MP's are seen to be fully embracing in social media so that the British Peoples are heard across as many communicating tools as possible 

By not doing so it breeds negativity and if your party is so sure their policies are working then they should embrace all the tools available to convey that message
attributes.background: It has long been frustrating that many Conservative MP's are not accountable via social media and in particular are devoid of a twitter account.

rejection.details: This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do. You could write to the Conservative Party directly to make this request.
